Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style or Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with added red and white bands; exterior: trace of possible guilloche pattern above two bands; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ11
Curator's comments: Marked in pencil on the outside 'Φ11'.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0658) (phase 2)
